name: Cobot
description: Cobot is an AI-powered to-do app that automates tasks using integrated apps and workflows to boost productivity.
longDescription: Cobot is a revolutionary to-do app that leverages AI agents, known as Cobots, to automatically complete tasks by integrating with users' existing applications. Its mission is to transform AI into a collaborative teammate, enabling autonomous productivity and exponential efficiency gains for individuals and teams. By simply adding a task, users can offload the execution to Cobot, which handles it using connected tools like email, calendar, and project management software. This solves common productivity challenges such as manual repetition and context-switching, allowing focus on creative and strategic work. Currently in beta, Cobot is accessible on iOS and web, with features for building and scheduling custom workflows.
features: Automates user-added tasks using AI agents called Cobots that integrate with existing apps, reducing manual effort and increasing efficiency.
Provides a library of over 30 third-party Cobots and pre-built workflows for quick discovery and implementation of automation solutions.
Enables creation and editing of structured workflows where users command Cobots in natural language for repeatable task execution.
Supports scheduling workflows to run on recurring bases like daily or weekly, allowing background automation without user intervention.
Allows multiple Cobots to collaborate across different apps, such as combining email, calendar, and Notion for comprehensive task handling.
Offers seamless integration with popular tools including Stripe, GitHub, Linear, Ramp, and more to streamline business and personal workflows.
Features a simple to-do list interface combined with powerful AI capabilities, making it accessible for both novice and advanced users.
Available in beta on iOS via TestFlight and web, ensuring cross-platform access for task management on the go.
Uses natural language processing to interpret task descriptions and execute them accurately through connected services.
Promotes autonomous productivity by handling repetitive tasks, freeing users to focus on higher-value activities.

faqs.question: What is Cobot?
faqs.answer: Cobot is an AI-driven to-do app that automates tasks using integrated apps and AI agents called Cobots. It turns a simple task list into an autonomous productivity tool by executing tasks on behalf of the user.

faqs.question: How does Cobot automate tasks?
faqs.answer: Users add tasks to the list, and Cobot uses connected apps and AI to complete them automatically. It leverages natural language commands and workflows to handle execution without further input.

faqs.question: What are third-party Cobots and Workflows?
faqs.answer: Third-party Cobots are AI agents for specific apps like Notion or GitHub, while Workflows are combinations of these agents to perform multi-step tasks. They can be discovered in the Cobot library and customized for user needs.

faqs.question: How can Cobot integrate with my existing tools?
faqs.answer: Cobot connects to over 30 apps including email, calendar, Stripe, Linear, and more via simple authentication. Once connected, Cobots use these tools to automate tasks seamlessly.

faqs.question: What is autonomous productivity?
faqs.answer: Autonomous productivity refers to AI handling routine tasks independently, allowing users to achieve more with less effort. Cobot embodies this by making AI a teammate that works in the background.

faqs.question: Is Cobot available on mobile?
faqs.answer: Yes, Cobot is available on iOS through TestFlight beta and on the web. This enables users to manage and automate tasks from anywhere.

faqs.question: Can I schedule recurring tasks in Cobot?
faqs.answer: Yes, workflows can be scheduled to run daily, weekly, or on custom intervals. This ensures ongoing automation without manual triggering.

faqs.question: How do I get started with Cobot?
faqs.answer: Sign up at https://cobot.co to access the beta version. Connect your apps, add tasks, and explore the library to begin automating.

faqs.question: Does Cobot support team collaboration?
faqs.answer: While primarily for individual productivity, Cobot's integrations with tools like GitHub and Linear enable team workflows. Future updates may expand direct team features.

faqs.question: What makes Cobot different from other to-do apps?
faqs.answer: Unlike traditional to-do apps that just list tasks, Cobot actively completes them using AI and app integrations. This shifts from manual management to automated execution.
